attributes.action:
Stop BBC taking our money 
Stop TV license we don’t need a TV license
attributes.background: The officers are bullies and a very intimidating. My wife has severe anxiety and these people keep coming around is not helping. And they don’t have the right to charge us airwave

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216189

You can complain about the behaviour of the people contacting you about the TV licence here:

http://www.tvlicensing.co.uk/about/making-a-complaint-AB7
